{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$254.2K in 2021-2022** on contracts with AVMAX AVIATION SERVICES.

Across 38 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 4 have at least one amendment (11%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 87% and the average number of amendments was 1.25. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$21.2K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.06 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$212.2K. The longest contract was 0.39 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$7.2M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

- [AVMAX AVIATION SERVICES INC](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22AVMAX%20AVIATION%20SERVICES%20INC%22)
{{< /details >}}
